edu.cnm.deepdive.funrun.model.entity

Class History

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.funrun.model.entity.History
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlatHistory

    @Entity
 @Component
public class History
extends java.lang.Object
implements FlatHistory
    Contains static methods, with convenience annotations, which provides additional information about history to assist Hibernate in mapping an entity class field to a table column in a Apache Derby database, and retrieved.
